ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Anyone else a bad fashion statement like me?
ygData.msgSnippet: Boy do I feel your pain!  I am NOT a twink, but since i have come back after retiring I have been powerleveling mostly, and have as follows: Brigandine tunic
ygData.messageBody:
Boy do I feel your pain! I am NOT a twink, but since i have come back after
retiring I have been powerleveling mostly, and have as follows:

Brigandine tunic (banded look)
lambent greaves (blue)
ss boots (green)
ss gloves (green)
skull shaped barbute (silver)
one lambent bracer (blue)
one imbrued bracer (dull yellow..seems to overwrite blue)
azure sleeves. (no graphic)

The look is actually not too bad on a half-elf, but i get mistaken for a
twink all the time.

Lago Bardoon of Bertox, 48th composition, Defenders of Aleria


>>>>
> I have to kiss my lambent and tree weave goodbye soon and get some
> imbrued,
> im tired of looking like all the twinks with various ss and lambent. Dont
> get me wrong, i have nothing against twinking but man im sick of passing
> for
> something that is 20-30 levels lower then i really am.
>>>>>
